passives.name: Round Edge Extension
passives.desc:
When using Round Edge:
 ‚Ä¢ Large BRV damage boost
 ‚Ä¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%

When using Round Edge+:
 ‚Ä¢ Large BRV damage boost
 ‚Ä¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 ‚Ä¢ Self: 1 turn Soul of Conflict when inflicting Break on target

While Soul of Chaos buff active:
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; largely increased cumulative BRV damage)
passives.short_desc: Round Edge Extension: Boost to Round Edge

passives.name: Buff Boost Speed
passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV„ÄÅ SPD with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buff Boost Speed: Raises MAX BRV„ÄÅ SPD

passives.name: Soul of Chaos Extension
passives.desc:
When using Soul of Chaos:
 ‚Ä¢ BRV attack hit count becomes 6; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 ‚Ä¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

When using Soul of Chaos+:
 ‚Ä¢ BRV attack hit count becomes 6; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 ‚Ä¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%
 ‚Ä¢ Self: 1 turn Soul of Conflict when inflicting Break on target

While Soul of Chaos buff active:
HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (melee BRV attack + HP attack; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
passives.short_desc: Soul of Chaos Extension: Boost to Soul of Chaos

passives.desc: Slightly raises MAX BRV„ÄÅ DEF
